name: La Grande Poursuite
description:
A hero is needed for this quest. A prophecy has been told of a hero found in the deep corners of the web. An oracle has found their personal steam page. Please help us find out who they are! 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a hard challenge. I suggest only approaching this problem after your team has solved numerous challenges. 

Please come up to us for the first step. We will provide a steam profile to start.

name: Steam Locomotive
description: Looks like some team is solving challenges a bit too fast! name: Lockpicking
description:
Are you interesting in learning how to pick a lock? Come speak with one of the CTF organizers to get a quick demo and a chance to pick your own lock!

Teams with a member that successfully picks the lock in under 5 minutes will receive 100 points for their team!

BUT WAIT, THERE'S MORE: The fastest team to pick a lock by the end of the CTF will win a fancy lock-picking set!
